levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Garden of Thorns​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] เมื่อมี 3+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] มอบ 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]' และ '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (1 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- เมื่อมี 4+ Corresponding Reson., มอบ 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] ฟื้นฟู 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage for 15% HP of their max HP
- ฟื้นฟู (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Garden of Thorns​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] ได้รับ (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 2)

- เมื่อมี 4+ Corresponding Reson., มอบ 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]'
- เมื่อมี 5+ Corresponding Reson., มอบ 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'

[EndSkill] ฟื้นฟู 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 18% HP of their max HP

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Garden of Thorns​</line-height>
levelList.desc:

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Bygone Days​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] ฟื้นฟู 10 ค่าสติ to self และ 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Countบนtarget, then ฟื้นฟู additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potencyบนtarget (Max ค่าสติ ฟื้นฟู: 20)
- If target is defeated, มอบ 3 [Sinking]บน2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Bygone Days​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] ฟื้นฟู <style="highlight">12</style> ค่าสติ to self และ 2 other allies with the least SP

- If target is defeated, มอบ 3 [Sinking] และ <style="highlight">1 [Curse]</style>บน2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Solemn Lament​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
When this Skill flips Coins, each เหรียญ flips aได้รับst a random enemy among its targets.
- The first เหรียญ always targets the main target.
- All 'On Hit' effects และ all ความเสียหาย ทำ t ไป each เหรียญ are inflicted only aได้รับst the random target the เหรียญ selected.
When inflicting [SinkingWhite] with this Skill effects: (Chance to flip Heads)% chance to มอบ The Departed. If this unit did not มอบ The Departed, มอบ The Living instead. (calculates every [SinkingWhite] stack independently)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] เมื่อมี 0+ SP, Reuse this เหรียญ (5 times max per Skill)
